page.title: 13Education-state school
page.content: There are 2 schools to be listed,providing general education. One is a state school and one a private school.{Pembridge State School is a volantary aided Church of England Primary school catering for 80 pupils. It provides education in a christian atmosphere and is linked to the local church and clergy.Religious instruction and daily worship are non_compulsery. Teaching of the children is undertaken by teachers with approved educational qualifacations. The school is organised into 3 classes.English and reading schemes are continous throughtout and are based On Phonic development.Mathmatics scheme provides continous progression, although a modern scheme traditional features e.g.Learning tables are
